text:
This was a surprise find! An extensive menu is offered.

The porridge is cooked to a gruel. It was cooked with a great stock base which lent it good depth.

Cuttlefish was excellent, fresh and springy.

Braised peanut was a good balance to the overall dish.

I am looking forward to visiting again to try other offerings.
Rich and thick porridge, very flavourful and affordable for the heartlanders. Feels like grandma cooking. Highly recommended for a tasty meal.
The century egg pork porridge was a hit, with rich flavors that really impressed. The owner's friendly service made the experience even more enjoyable!

One of the best porridge ever. Always crave for the porridge after some time. It’s fragrant and has a good balance of saltiness. I always go for triple egg porridge and century egg porridge. The sliced pork porridge is awesome too with a unique pork fragrant.

The youtiao is unbeatable compared to other stores as they fry on the spot, so it’s crispy and hot. Shiok!!
Surprisingly not bad. Their signature porridge is addictive; paired with the perfect you tiao.
